thread.section_title: Le Parisis Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Hotel, Fantastic View
thread.title_full: Fantastic Hotel, Fantastic View - Review of Le Parisis Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TheBairnTravels
title: Fantastic Hotel, Fantastic View
text:
The hotel was in a great location, the staff were very friendly and welcoming.
The room was beautiful and comfortable and well equipped. Nespresso machine, mineral water, l'occitane toiletries, even a mobile phone for your use around Paris.
The view from our window was fantastic. The perfect hotel!
